steps.title: Begin by making the outline sketches for Iron Man.
steps.content: Begin by making the outline sketches for Iron Man.

steps.title: Add the outline sketches for Captain America.
steps.content: Add the outline sketches for Captain America. Try to show the outline sketches of the subject’s accessories already to make it easier for you to see the composition of the subjects towards each other’s area.

steps.title: Draw the outline sketches of The Mighty, Thor.
steps.content: Draw the outline sketches of The Mighty, Thor. You can see that the hammer is already included in the outline sketches.

steps.title: Add Hawkeye’s outline sketches.
steps.content: Add Hawkeye’s outline sketches.

steps.title: Continue with the outline sketches of Black Widow.
steps.content: Continue with the outline sketches of Black Widow.

steps.title: Finish the outline sketches of The Hulk at the back of the other subjects.
steps.content: Finish the outline sketches of The Hulk at the back of the other subjects. Since The Hulk is a huge character, we should put him behind the others to avoid blocking.

steps.title: Start drawing the actual lines for Iron Man.
steps.content: Start drawing the actual lines for Iron Man.

steps.title: Add the actual lines of Thor.
steps.content: Add the actual lines of Thor.

steps.title: Draw the actual lines of Captain America.
steps.content: Draw the actual lines of Captain America.

steps.title: Continue with the actual lines of Hawkeye.
steps.content: Continue with the actual lines of Hawkeye.

steps.title: Draw the actual lines of Black Widow.
steps.content: Draw the actual lines of Black Widow.

steps.title: Finish the actual lines of The Hulk.
steps.content: Finish the actual lines of The Hulk.

steps.title: Erase the outline sketches.
steps.content: Erase the outline sketches.

steps.title: Fill in the basic colors of Iron Man.
steps.content: Fill in the basic colors of Iron Man.

steps.title: You can put a primer of white on the areas to be colored.
steps.content: You can put a primer of white on the areas to be colored. Fill in the basic colors for Thor.

steps.content: Fill in the basic colors for Captain America.

steps.title: Fill in the basic colors of the Black Widow.
steps.content: Fill in the basic colors of the Black Widow.

steps.content: Add the basic colors of Hawkeye.

steps.title: Fill in the basic colors of The Hulk.
steps.content: Fill in the basic colors of The Hulk.

steps.title: Add the highlights and shadows.
steps.content: Add the highlights and shadows.

steps.title: Finish the draft by emphasizing visual effects of their powers.
steps.content: Finish the draft by emphasizing visual effects of their powers. Thor’s hammer shows bright light on it, indicating its power.

steps.title: Begin by drawing six lines that separates each member of the Avengers.
steps.content: Begin by drawing six lines that separates each member of the Avengers.
